title: Why os there no Solo queu optiion
body: as the title says, why osi there no solo queue option for pre season? why do we have to be stuck with this aram mmr esque ranked queue.

replies.body:
You know, if you read the *very first stickied thread* on the boards you'd have your answer.

Since you're obviously half-blind, here's a link for you: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/aAfOmVeI-oce-preseason-ranked-queue-testing
